introduction: SYNOPSISJang Hyun, a division head of a trading company, is happily married to Moon-hee when his ex-girlfriend Kyung-hwa from his journalist days returns to Korea from abroad. Hyun had fooled around with Kyung-hwa while he was engaged to Moon-hee but dumped her when he found out her mother was a dissolute woman. But Kyung-hwa has not forgotten him and she begins to torment Moon-hee who has a heart problem. Hyun quits his job when Kyung-hwa starts to approach his boss. Hyun pretends going to work but heads for Kyung-hwa's villa and Moon-hee collapses from shock when the company calls to inform Hyun to pick up his severance pay. Meanwhile, Michael Jeong, Kyung-hwa's ex-boyfriend from the United States comes to Seoul in search of Kyung-hwa. Kyung-hwa who is pregnant with Hyun's baby decides to leave them both and raise the child alone. Michael shows up as the two share a final drink and shoot her out of anger for her betrayal.故事这家贸易公司的负责人张炫与南门熙住在一起，与前情人尹庆华住在美国。张贤结婚前离开她的未婚妻Nam Mun-hee，接近Kyeong-hwa，但知道她的母亲是妓女。然而，硬化不忘记他，折磨心脏病耐心的Munhee。当江华坚持不懈地接近包括接近老板时，张炫辞职。作为出差的借口，张贤去了庆华的别墅，联系了Moon Hee从公司领取退休金。另一方面，在美国与京仁关系的迈克尔·荣格来到汉城找到了京华。怀着张贤的孩子，康在这两个人之间徘徊，离开张炫决定抚养孩子。在最后一次告别酒会的人面前，郑重庆出现，发现他被庆华欺骗，并向她开枪。
